input_email_body:
Subject: Request to Update Payment Preferences for Marketing

Dear customer support, I am writing to request an update to my billing information in relation to payment preferences for software and hardware products used in marketing strategies My name is Sophia Rossi.. I would appreciate your assistance in making these changes. Specifically, I would like to update my credit card information and change my billing address. Additionally, I would like to set up automatic payments for my subscription services You can reach me at carlosm@gmail.com.. Please let me know the steps I need to take to complete this process. I appreciate your help and look forward to it.
